Package logistikoptimierung.Services.EnumeratedCalculation

Class EnumeratedCalculationMain

java.lang.Object
logistikoptimierung.Services.EnumeratedCalculation.EnumeratedCalculationMain
All Implemented Interfaces:
IOptimizationService
public class EnumeratedCalculationMain extends Object implements IOptimizationService
Creates an object of the optimizer with an enumeration of the possibilities and combinations for handling the order. For this the algorithm gets every needed step for transportation, production and delivery and orders them in every combination and simulates the factory to find the best result. For the transport and driver constraints a Driver pool in the size of the nr of drivers and if the pool is full the first driver is used again. This ensures with the trying of every combination that different drivers and transporters are used in the optimization.

  • Constructor Details

    • EnumeratedCalculationMain

      public EnumeratedCalculationMain(Instance instance, long maxRuntime, boolean condenseMaterialSupplies, long maxSystemRunTimeInNanoSeconds)
      Creates an object of the optimizer with an enumeration of the possibilities and combinations for handling the order. For this the algorithm gets every needed step for transportation, production and delivery and orders them in every combination and simulates the factory to find the best result. For the transport and driver constraints a Driver pool in the size of the nr of drivers and if the pool is full the first driver is used again. This ensures with the trying of every combination that different drivers and transporters are used in the optimization.
      Parameters:
      instance - with the factory and the orderlist where the optimization should happen
      maxRuntime - maximum run time for the optimization
      condenseMaterialSupplies - condenses the supplying of the material to
      maxSystemRunTimeInNanoSeconds - sets the Runtime of the calculation in seconds, after the time is reached the best result found in the time is returned

  • Method Details

    • optimize

      public List<FactoryStep> optimize(int nrOfOrdersToOptimize)
      Optimizes the order list for the nr given in the parameter. Returns an empty list if the order nr is higher than the available orders.
      Specified by:
      optimize in interface IOptimizationService
      Parameters:
      nrOfOrdersToOptimize - nr of orders which should be optimized.
      Returns:
      a list of factory steps for the orders

    • getNrOfSimulations
